name: rust-panic-highlighter
description: Highlights lines in Rust code that can panic

diagnostic.severity.description: Set the severity level for Rust panic diagnostics.

icon.enabled.description: Enable or disable the icon display at the end of the line.

icon.path.description: Specify the path to the icon to display at the end of the line. It is recommended to use an SVG file. Use 'default' to load the extension's default icon.

icon.width.description: Specify the width of the icon in pixels. This setting is only applicable to SVG files. Ensure that the SVG does not have a default width set, as it may override the configured size.

icon.height.description: Specify the height of the icon in pixels. This setting is only applicable to SVG files. Ensure that the SVG does not have a default height set, as it may override the configured size.

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
